official_title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on aqueous emulsion of a modified aliphatic amine mixture of: decanedioic acid, compounds with 1,3- benzenedimethanamine- bisphenol A-bisphenol A diglycidyl etherdiethylenetriamine glycidyl phenyl ether reaction productepichlorohydrinformaldehyde- propylene oxidetriethylenetetramine polymer.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on aqueous emulsion of a modified aliphatic amine mixture of: decanedioic acid, compounds with 1,3- benzenedimethanamine- bisphenol A-bisphenol A diglycidyl etherdiethylenetriamine glycidyl phenyl ether reaction productepichlorohydrinformaldehyde- propylene oxidetriethylenetetramine polymer.
